article_title: Peyote, birth control and the Supreme Court

article_metadata.description: All In traces the Supreme Court's recent history on religious freedom as the court prepares to hear Hobby Lobby's challenge of the birth control mandate. MSNBC.com's Irin Carmon discusses.
